thread.title: Twitter names Omid Kordestani as executive chairman
thread.title_full: Twitter names Omid Kordestani as executive chairman

title: Twitter names Omid Kordestani as executive chairman
text: October 14, 2015 at 09:02 AM EDT Twitter names Omid Kordestani as executive chairman Twitter named Omid Kordestani, Google's chief business officer, as its new executive chairman on Wednesday. Markets are closed on certain holidays. Stock Market Holiday List By accessing this page, you agree to the following Press Release Service provided by PRConnect. Stock quotes supplied by Six Financial
